title: Waste treatment facility not reducing pollution ? Tropico 6
body: I find it works better if you have 2 dumps (one for residential and one for industrial) next to each other, and the waste treatment facility next to them. The dumps will fairly quickly remove the pollution from your houses/factories, and the treatment facility will slowly reduce the pollution of the dumps. I tried that too, but the problem is ...
readable_content:
- heyitsuglypotato (2018-12-02): Waste treatment facility not reducing pollution ? Tropico 6

So, is this a bug or what? I place waste treatment facility beside my power plant, but it's not reducing pollution on my overlays. My waste treatment is on clean incineration mode and full budget, fyi.

- WyldKat75 (2018-12-02): I believe it takes time to start chipping away at what's already there.

- Eathlome (2018-12-02): I find it works better if you have 2 dumps (one for residential and one for industrial) next to each other, and the waste treatment facility next to them. The dumps will fairly quickly remove the pollution from your houses/factories, and the treatment facility will slowly reduce the pollution of the dumps.

- the_io (2018-12-02): Sea Disposal will help massively.
